title: why u increased the price of google pixel 5
content: HI IM FROM CANADA,AND I LOOKED INTO THE WEBSITE TO DAYS BACK AND THE PRICE WAS 700$  AND NOW WHEN I LOOKED TODAY THE PRICE HAS INCREASED ....SEEING VARIATIONS IN PRICE TODAY DOESNT MAKE ANY SENSE AT ALL...Actually the phone price is 700$ before 2 days....now its 800$.....BUT WHY??CAN YOU PLEASE EXPLAIN IT TO ME
